sentences.sContent: When I first started teleworking from Dallas to Palo Alto in 1997, I was almost always the only remote person in the meetings I attended.
sentences.sContent_eng: When I first started teleworking from Dallas to Palo Alto in 1997, I was almost always the only remote person in the meetings I attended.
sentences.sCn: 当我第一次开始远程电话会议时，还是在1997年，从Dallas到Palo Alto。 在参加的那些会议中，我几乎总是唯一的远程参会者。

sentences.sContent: What is the benefits and drawbacks of teleworking?
sentences.sContent_eng: What is the benefits and drawbacks of teleworking?
sentences.sCn: 远程办公的优缺点是什么？
